clangd.path.description: The path to clangd executable, e.g.: /usr/bin/clangd.

clangd.useScriptAsExecutable.description: Allows the path to be a script e.g.: clangd.sh.

clangd.trace.description: Names a file that clangd should log a performance trace to, in chrome trace-viewer JSON format.

clangd.semanticHighlighting.deprecationMessage: Legacy semanticHighlights is no longer supported. Please use `editor.semanticHighlighting.enabled` instead.

clangd.fallbackFlags.description: Extra clang flags used to parse files when no compilation database is found.

clangd.serverCompletionRanking.description: Always rank completion items on the server as you type. This produces more accurate results at the cost of higher latency than client-side filtering.

clangd.restartAfterCrash.description: Auto restart clangd (up to 4 times) if it crashes.

clangd.checkUpdates.description: Check for language server updates on startup.

clangd.onConfigChanged.description: What to do when clangd configuration files are changed. Ignored for clangd 12+, which can reload such files itself; however, this can be overridden with clangd.onConfigChanged.forceEnable.
enumDescriptions: Prompt the user for restarting the server

clangd.onConfigChanged.forceEnable.description: Force enable of "On Config Changed" option regardless of clangd version.

clangd.detectExtensionConflicts.description: Warn about conflicting extensions and suggest disabling them.

clangd.inactiveRegions.useBackgroundHigh.description: Use a background highlight rather than opacity to identify inactive preprocessor regions.

clangd.inactiveRegions.opacity.description: Opacity of inactive regions (used only if clangd.inactiveRegions.useBackgroundHighlight=false)

clangd.enableCodeCompletion.description: Enable code completion provided by the language server

clangd.enableHover.description: Enable hovers provided by the language server
